issues.summary: [All Products Page] update banner discount copy on product cards based on the discount type
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*User Story / Description:*

As a RTE active customer who lands on Factor Form products page with a 50% year voucher applied, I should have consistent discount info over all voucher discount communications along the funnel.
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Voucher offer should be properly contextualized over the all offer elements in all products and product details pages.
* The {{FJ-VMS-50OFF1YR-RTE-PEAK}} should present 1 Year 50% discount communication for RTE actives in the banner and other offer banners (product cards in all products page and quantity option in PDP greens)
* The communication for the fallback voucher, 40% off first order, should also be in conformance over all offer communication elements.

*Testing Requirements:*

* Offer presented by product cards should be the same provided by PPS service
* Offer presented by quantity options in the Greens page, should be the same given by the PPS service

*Affected Brands:*
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Accessibility Requirements:*
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Developer Notes:*

This update enables discount banners in the card to present custom discount communication based on the discount communication ID provided in the URL.

To enable retro compatibility, we should ensure to handle cases where no discount communication id is attributed or when it does, to do not show the incorrect discount communication.

Required changes: 

* CUI → Discount Communication: Use some suitable key to provide the copy and add the placeholder for discount.
** We should use some not used field that is suitable for this purpose on VMS, or request support from owners (not found yet) to include the fields we need in the page
** Currently, this communication is done via Applanga only
* On Web, consolidate all SKUs that shows discount banner in the {{price-presentation/v2/discount_communication/voucher/}} service to obtain the copy for the given discount communication.
{pane

comments.author: Hamed Karimian
comments.body: [~accountid:62d18d3c078104d0866dc9b0] can you please update the ticket to also address the fallback mechanism we discussed yesterday?  i.e., if user is not an active Factor customer, all banners should properly fallback on the default “Limited time offer: 40% off first order!“

comments.author: Jan Leite
comments.body: Consider it done [~accountid:712020:4b6a0b29-53dc-45ce-82fb-0ac6a91e6feb], thanks for highlight it.

comments.author: Edwin Torres
comments.body:
Comments after validation:

# The {{defaultDiscountCommId: '7e6a6f43-0db8-46ae-8aa9-b4aa320ead87',}} needs to support the new {{6744ac0f-e6d7-4332-a3bd-70a1cafd1b15}} that contains the year message. – I'll work on that extension in the existing an Open PR.
# There is an issue with a copy on dashboard, it shows like {{500%}} somewhere with a wrong calculus. – I'll work on that one too separately.
